name: 360° Synchro Spiral to Half Pipe Combo
description: Combination of a Synchro Spiral and Half Pipe Combo

criterias.normal: after a turn – 360° – of Synchro Spiral the pilots connect to a half pipe and exit it towards each other and start another 360° turn to the other direction in Synchro Spiral, after the turn another connection to a Half Pipe
